code: import React,{Component}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class PageRenderer extends Component{constructor(props){super(props);this.fetchRecipesData=()=>{fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/recipes').then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>{this.setState({data,error:null});}).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching data:',error));};this.setCurrentPage=(pageName,id)=>{this.setState({currentPage:pageName,recipeId:id});};this.state={currentPage:'home',recipeId:null,data:[],error:null};}componentDidMount(){this.fetchRecipesData();}render(){const{currentPage,data,error}=this.state;let pageContent,tableContent;switch(currentPage){case'home':tableContent=/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Action"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:data.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:item.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>(this.setCurrentPage('recipe',item.id),console.log('Item '+item.id+' clicked')),children:"View"})})]},index))})]});pageContent=/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Food Recipes"}),tableContent]});break;case'recipe':let recipeItem=data.find(item=>item.id===this.state.recipeId);pageContent=/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["Recipe ID: ",recipeItem.id]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Recipe name: ",recipeItem.name]})]});break;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{children:pageContent})});}};export default PageRenderer;
